musicalLanguage.description: Erroll Garner's most famous composition — a lush, romantic ballad with wide melodic leaps and rich chromatic harmony. The opening octave leap (Bb to Bb) is one of the most recognizable gestures in all of jazz. The chords are dense and colorful, requiring careful voicing and pedal technique.
musicalLanguage.structure: AABA — 32 bars. This excerpt: first A section (8 bars)
keyMoments: Bar 1: The signature octave leap Bb4 to Bb5 — sets the dreamy mood instantly
Bar 3-4: Chromatic inner voice movement as chords shift — Abm7 to Db7
Bar 7-8: The phrase resolves with a gentle rubato feel — take your time
teachingGoals: Wide melodic intervals — reaching across the keyboard with confidence
Rich jazz ballad voicings with extensions (9ths, 13ths)
Rubato phrasing — stretching and compressing time expressively
styleTips: Use sustain pedal generously — this is a lush ballad, let chords ring
The melody should sing above everything — bring it out with touch
Tempo is flexible — slow down at phrase peaks, move forward in transitions

measures.leftHand: Eb3 G3 Bb3:h Eb3 G3 Bb3:h
measures.teachingNote: EbMaj7 — the famous octave leap from Bb4 to Bb5. Let it soar.

measures.leftHand: Bb2 F3 Ab3:h Bb2 F3 Ab3:h
measures.teachingNote: Bbm7 — melody descends gracefully. Left hand provides a warm Bb minor cushion.

measures.leftHand: Ab2 Eb3 Gb3:h Db3 F3 Ab3:h
measures.teachingNote: Abm7 to Db7 — chromatic passing chords. The inner voices shift beautifully.

measures.leftHand: Eb3 G3 Bb3:h Eb3 G3 Bb3:h
measures.teachingNote: EbMaj7 — resolution. The melody climbs back up to C5, settling in.

measures.leftHand: C3 Eb3 G3:h F3 A3 Eb4:h
measures.teachingNote: Cm7 to F7 — the ii-V of Bb. Melody ascends through the chord tones.

measures.leftHand: Bb2 D3 F3 Ab3:h Bb2 D3 F3 Ab3:h
measures.teachingNote: Bb7 — dominant chord with lush left-hand voicing including the 7th. Let it breathe.

measures.leftHand: Eb3 G3 Bb3:h Ab2 C3 Eb3:h
measures.teachingNote: EbMaj7 to Ab — melody descends in a gentle cascade. Slow down slightly.
EbMaj7 — final resolution. Hold the whole note with pedal. Breathe.
